description.value:
The Archfey lets you choose from an expanded list of spells when you learn a warlock spell. The following spells are added to the warlock spell list for you.

Spell Level Spells
1st @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.ExJukBkgDfUo7h9o]{Faerie Fire}, @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.ieouWH8zqoaYHPeG]{Sleep}
2nd @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.FITDsvKW3cQZt4t3]{Calm Emotions}, @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.L9I53ZZT4z6Q7Ypa]{Phantasmal Force}
3rd @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.9B0luNcaaHSDAQps]{Blink}, @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.5lZIyMdWRQZX4qwe]{Plant Growth}
4th @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.mmmnJAeXZ4TaxPwy]{Dominate Beast}, @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.heHdo5e6AQ4DULiR]{Greater Invisibility}
5th @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.vZVDWUj69cLI1Qhz]{Dominate Person}, @Compendium[5e-complete.5e-spells.5LCky8OiMknllj3f]{Seeming}

magicitems.destroyFlavorText: reaches 0 charges: it crumbles into ashes and is destroyed.
